revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRVS4400N |revision=v1.0 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/09/2006 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-WRVS4400N |ic_id=3839A-WRVS440N |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Star |cpu1_model=STR9202 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand=Star |cpu2_model=STR9109 |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2=32 |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Gemtek WMIM-205GN |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI (long) |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8361P |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8060 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Star |eth_chip2_model=STR9109 |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Vitesse |sw_model=VSC7385 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:1C:10 |oui_eth=00:1C:10 |default_ch= }} ''Wireless-N Gigabit Security Router with VPN''
[http://www.cisco.com/en/US/products/ps9931/index.html Product page]
[http://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/routers/csbr/wrvs4400n/administration/guide/WRVS4400N_AG_OL-20048.pdf Administration guide] [http://www.hydrogenaudio.org/forums/index.php?showtopic=58720 Shell access on the WRVS4400N] (linked from [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=22577 here on the DD-WRT forums])
[http://homecommunity.cisco.com/t5/Wireless-Routers/stable-Firmware-for-WRVS4400N-with-working-IPv6/td-p/279867 'stable Firmware for WRVS4400N with working IPv6' on the Linksys forums] links to the firmware [http://www.tytec.de/Project4.htm here] The STR9109 appears to handle the WLAN while the STR9202 handles the Ethernet interfaces. Per [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=9211 this thread on the OpenWrt forums], the STR9109 has access to 32MB RAM and the STR9202 has access to 64MB RAM. The wireless card in the FCC photos has an OUI of 00:14:A5 indicating a Gemtek device. It appears identical to the [[Gemtek WMIM-205GN]]. The main board appears to be OEM SerComm. The manual on the Cisco-Linksys site says the default SSID is 'ciscosb'. The manual in the FCC documents says the default SSID is 'linksys-n'.
